title: A Boston physician said he had a severe allergic reaction to Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine, the first reported case of its kind for the shot. Moderna is looking into it.
content: A Boston physician said he had a severe allergic reaction to Moderna's COVID-19 vaccine, the first reported case of its kind for the shot. Moderna is looking into it.  Yahoo NewsView Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: 波士顿的一名医生说，他对现代的冠状病毒疫苗有严重的过敏反应，这是报道的第一例此类疫苗注射病例。摩迪纳正在调查此事。
波士頓的一名醫生說，他對現代的冠狀病毒疫苗有嚴重的過敏反應，這是報道的第一例此類疫苗注射病例。摩迪納正在調查此事。
